name: Rolling Late
description:
Working at the casino can be a tough time- especially if you're one of the dice! And it's just your luck that today you overslept, leaving your coworker and the dealer waiting for you to show up at the dice table.

Roll your way through a variety of landscapes, collecting your pips (black dots) as you go. Then, switch between your collected faces in order to traverse challenging platforming challenges. Can you make it to work in time, or today are you just going to roll snake eyes? Find out in "Rolling Late"!

**Bug Reports**

- The control menu at the top of the screen has a JUMP button prompt which reads SHIFT or W. It is supposed to say SPACE or W.

- After the 3rd level ends, it unintentionally restarts. That is where the game should end with an end card (see screenshots)

****

Controls:

Move - A/D

Jump - W/Space

Change Faces - Hold Shift and Press W/S or the number keys (1-6)

Credits:

Code - Pixel Myth, eggpowered

Art/UI - eggpowered

Music/SFX - Pixel Myth

Level Design - Pixel Myth
